UPCOMING_ELECTIONS_CONTENT: To view upcoming elections, go to the '<1><text>{{ELECTION_PROCEDURE}}</text></1>' menu; To see the calendar view, go to the '<1><text>{{ELECTION_CALENDAR}}</text></1>' submenu, and for a report view, go to the '<1><text>{{POSSIBLE_SELECTION}}</text></1>' option.
SPECIFIC_SELECTION_CONTENT: To quickly view a specific election, select 'Election Type' and 'Candidate Type' for search.
CITY_CORPORATION_ELECTION_CONTENT: To view a specific city corporation election, select 'Division Name', 'RMO', 'Election Type', and in applicable cases, select 'Candidate Type' for search. Set the default search time to 02 months from now; adjust the start and end times as needed.
PLEASE_CONATCT: If you can't find the answer, please contact
